titleDescription: Cordless, compact and powerful lawnmower for small gardens
shortDescription: Battery: 40V (2x 20V) / 2x 2Ah. Drive system: need to be pushed. Run time (no load): up to 40 min. For lawns up to 250 m². Charging time: 60 min. Cutting width: 37 cm. Wheels: 150 mm / 200 mm. Height adjustment: 6 positions, 25–75 mm. Collecting bag: 40 l, textile with hard top. Weight: 12.4* kg (without a battery). Warranty: 24 months. 2 batteries and dual fast charger included.
fullDescription: Battery: 40V (2x 20V) / 2x 2Ah. Drive system: need to be pushed. Run time (no load): up to 40 min. For lawns up to 250 m². Charging time: 60 min. Cutting width: 37 cm. Wheels: 150 mm / 200 mm. Height adjustment: 6 positions, 25–75 mm. Collecting bag: 40 l, textile with hard top. Weight: 12.4* kg (without a battery). Warranty: 24 months. 2 batteries and dual fast charger included.

titleDescription: IKRA IEAS 750 saw chain Electric telescopic pruner
shortDescription: IKRA IEAS Electric telescopic pruner with 750 watts of power. IKRA IEAS 750 with OREGON brand bar and low-vibration chain for cutting branches at working heights of up to four meters. Telescopic fiberglass and aluminum shaft with variable height adjustment, cutting length up to 18.5 cm, tool-free installation and chain tensioning. Nhe light weight ensures comfortable and safe work in hard-to-reach, high places
fullDescription: IKRA IEAS Electric telescopic pruner with 750 watts of power. IKRA IEAS 750 with OREGON brand bar and low-vibration chain for cutting branches at working heights of up to four meters. Telescopic fiberglass and aluminum shaft with variable height adjustment, cutting length up to 18.5 cm, tool-free installation and chain tensioning. Nhe light weight ensures comfortable and safe work in hard-to-reach, high places

titleDescription: Leaf Blower/Vacuum 3000 IEBV, High-quality standards, German quality control.
shortDescription: High-quality standards, German quality control. Operates in two modes: as a leaf vacuum for collecting dry leaves, and as a blower for gathering dry leaves or blowing leaves out of hard-to-reach areas. In vacuum mode, it also functions as a mulcher, reducing the leaf volume at an approximate 10:1 ratio, so the leaves take up less space in the collection bag and can be reused for composting.
fullDescription: High-quality standards, German quality control. Operates in two modes: as a leaf vacuum for collecting dry leaves, and as a blower for gathering dry leaves or blowing leaves out of hard-to-reach areas. In vacuum mode, it also functions as a mulcher, reducing the leaf volume at an approximate 10:1 ratio, so the leaves take up less space in the collection bag and can be reused for composting.
